channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- FileNet P8 Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- FileNet P8 Platform

item.title: CVE-2018-1556|2024-09-16T19:05:43.544Z -- ibm -- filenet%20p8%20platform
item.description: IBM FileNet Content Manager 5.2.1 and 5.5.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 142893.
